definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: In fact, the cross-product gives us two in one.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，叉積同時給出了這兩個信息。

sentences.english: To find the surface element together with a normal vector, I would just take the cross-product between these guys.
sentences.chinese: 爲了找到帶法向量的面元，我就取這兩個的叉積。
